item.title: Program Structure
item.description: Create structure Create folder for our program. Let’s say it will be go-program/ In this directory do go mod init go-program In this directory create main.go file These are essential and common start for all Go programs. main.go main.go contains main() function which is entry point for any Go programm. The minimal main.go looks like: package main func main() { // code will be executed here }

item.title: Declaring Variables
item.description: Here are all the ways you can declare and assign value to variable: var counter int counter = 10 But we can do shorter var counter int = 10 More shorter! var counter = 10 And the most shortest… Notice, this one works only inside functions! counter := 10
